title.narrative: 2. Service Delivery - 2.1 Scale up GBV CoE _2.1.3 Develop an operation plan

description.narrative:
-KHF signed an agreement with the NCFA. The NCFA met with the technical internal committee at IFH and presented the criteria for accreditation. The development of a technical plane is the next step. IFH is now waiting on NCFA for further instructions.
-KHF signed an agreement with the HPC who met with the technical internal committee at IFH and presented the criteria for accreditation. The development of a technical plane is the next step. IFH is now waiting on NCFA for further instructions.
-Evaluating the current level of anxiety and depression among 400 GBV cases : Evaluating the current level of anxiety and depression among 400 GBV cases. Two phases of satisfaction surveys conducted pre -capacity building for the centres- and post utilizing the Hopkins Symptoms Checklist (HSCL) ; a well-known and widely used screening instrument. it is a symptom inventory which measures symptoms of anxiety and depression
The National Council for Family Affairs (NCFA) along with the Higher Population Council (HPC) delivered a list of requirements to IFH to upscale the clinics into Centers of Excellence (COE)

activity-date.narrative: At which point the infrastructural modifications will start taking place at the clinics.
time used to agree on requirements for each of the centres understudy

Guide -National Standards for Youth Friendly Sexual and Reproductive Health Service developed by the Higher population Council

Memorandum of understanding with the Higher Population Council (HPC) to conduct pre-assessment for the 4 Centers Sweileh, Karak, Zarqa and Ajloun to measure the current level of adhering with the National Standards for Youth-Friendly Sexual and Reproductive Health Services” that was developed by HPC.

National Council for Family Affairs (NCFA) guide including the requirements for Centers of Excellence (COEs)
NCFA guide or requirements for COEs
Evaluating the current level of anxiety and depression among 400 GBV cases. Target Groups-GBV cases who have/ or will attend the IFH clinics in the four governorates (Language: Arabic)

Two phases of satisfaction surveys conducted pre -capacity building for the centres- and post utilizing the Hopkins Symptoms Checklist (HSCL) ; a well-known and widely used screening instrument. it is a symptom inventory which measures symptoms of anxiety and depression. The Hopkins Symptoms Checklist (HSCL) is a well-known and widely used screening instrument whose history dates from the 1950s. It was originally designed by Parloff, Kelman, and Frank at Johns Hopkins University. (Language: English)
